author: Algirdas Mulevicius
description: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass.
name: Spring Revival

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
